query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM timeSeriesData) as time_series_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM researchPublications) as publications_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM economicEvents) as events_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM glossaryTerms) as glossary_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM indicatorDefinitions) as indicators_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dataSources) as sources_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users) as users_count;
